Text: I see you've discovered my scavenger hunt. Well done.^If you can complete it, I'll make it worth your while, kid.^  Your friend, Mr. Qi

Dear @,^^Thank you so much for bringing those leeks for George. He absolutely loved them!^I have an extra garden hose nozzle I want to give you. They are really handy for watering the gardens around town, so I thought you might put it to good use on your farm.^^-Evelyn
Hi @,^^I was looking through the trash you brought me, and I found this. It looks like farm equipment. I hope it's useful.^^-Linus

Dear @,^^Thanks for delivering the produce. The quality was excellent, and my customers loved them.^^I found this old sprinkler nozzle in the back of the store, and figured it could improve production on your farm. I look forward to seeing more quality produce shipped my way!^^   -Pierre
